extendedInfo.description: This App uses standard formulas to help Contractors or Do It Yourself Handymen calculate a rough estimate of the materials needed for a particular job. Currently the app can estimate paint needed, roofing materials (Shingles), and sheetrock and mud and tape supplies. There are plans to add other estimators as well. If you have any questions or comments drop a line to ecs.computems@gmail.com
